name: Get Hired!
description:
You are a henchman in Gotham City, and your mission is to get hired by Jonathan Crane the Scarecrow! The Catch? A Job interview of course.  Pass through the job interview and see what you get. There are 3 visible endings and a good chunck of secret scenes.

Hope you enjoy it and have a nice day!

-----------------------------------------

Hello! Thank you for looking at 'GET HIRED!' the game.

This is my first game done in Renpy on about a week and a half, my first attempt at coding or making a game, never the less I hope you enjoy it.  Be sure to tell me if you find any issues on the road.

Follow me on Tumblr

Look at Patreon!
